clientId.description: Unique client id issued by the identity provider.

clientSecret.description: Unique client secret issued by the identity provider.

userNameClaim.description: ADVANCED. The attribute / claim used to derive the DataHub username. Defaults to "preferred_username".

userNameClaimRegex.description: ADVANCED. TThe regex used to parse the DataHub username from the user name claim. Defaults to (.*) (all).

scope.description: ADVANCED. String representing the requested scope from the IdP. Defaults to "oidc email profile".

clientAuthenticationMethod.description: ADVANCED. Which authentication method to use to pass credentials (clientId and clientSecret) to the token endpoint: Defaults to "client_secret_basic".

jitProvisioningEnabled.description: ADVANCED. Whether DataHub users should be provisioned on login if they do not exist. Defaults to true.

preProvisioningRequired.description: ADVANCED. Whether the user should already exist in DataHub on login, failing login if they are not. Defaults to false.

extractGroupsEnabled.description: ADVANCED. Whether groups should be extracted from a claim in the OIDC profile. Only applies if JIT provisioning is enabled. Groups will be created if they do not exist. Defaults to true.

groupsClaim.description: ADVANCED. The OIDC claim to extract groups information from. Defaults to 'groups'.

extractJwtAccessTokenClaims.description: ADVANCED. Whether to extract claims from JWT access token.  Defaults to false.

preferredJwsAlgorithm.description: ADVANCED. Which jws algorithm to use. Unused.

preferredJwsAlgorithm2.description: ADVANCED. Which jws algorithm to use.
